teachers.name: Angela Eibner
teachers.description: Angela has over 30 years of teaching experience and is committed to supporting each learner develop their English communication skills. She grew up in London and trained as a language teacher on moving to Switzerland. Besides the CTEFL and Masters in English Language Teaching, she has a Business English Certificate and the Diploma in Adult Education. She lives in Rafz.

teachers.name: Bev Visser
teachers.description: Bev grew up in Johannesburg, South Africa. She studied communications and was a stay-at-home mum to her 3 children. After settling in Switzerland, she saw the need for qualified English teachers and completed her CELTA training in 2012. She lives in Rafz. She values working with her students and sharing her enjoyment of the language.
